#summary Shows folder item sizes as a chart with some interaction

= Introduction =

For the current panel directory this tool calculates file and directory sizes and shows the results as a chart in a modal window with some interaction. It helps to find unwanted disk space consumers.

= Prerequisites =

 * Far Manager 2.0.1634+
 * Plugin FarNet 4.3.26+ (cancellable progress form)
 * .NET Framework 4.0 (charting and parallel processing)

= Features =

 * Left click on a file shown in the panel sets it current;
 * Left click on a folder opens it in the current panel;
 * Left click in other areas switches the chart modes;
 * Right click hides an item in the chart;
 * Chart tooltips show approximate sizes.
